title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' section, the column icons fail to appear.
EB: Expectedly, when expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' section, both table icons and column icons should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and navigate to the 'Available Items' section.
2. Expand the 'Data Source' by clicking the related icon.
3. Verify that both table icons and column icons should be visible, indicating successful connection to the Derby database.
